role.argrole: entities between which there is too much difference

example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 朱延平)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VV 认为) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NN 国片)) (NP (NN 映演) (NN 管道))) (NP (NN 水准))) (VP (VV 相去太远))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 问题))) (VP (ADVP (AD 很)) (VP (VA 严重)))))))
example.arg: 国片 映演 管道 水准
